spec.expr:
_stream:{log.syslog.appname=panos,panos.device_name in(${firewall:doublequote}),panos.virtual_system in(${virtual_system:doublequote}),panos.type=${type:doublequote},panos.threat/content_type in(${subtype:doublequote}),network.direction=${direction:doublequote}}
AND panos.action:($action) AND $Logsql
| stats by (panos.source_location) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 5

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=panos,panos.device_name in(${firewall:doublequote}),panos.virtual_system in(${virtual_system:doublequote}),panos.type=${type:doublequote},panos.threat/content_type in(${subtype:doublequote}),network.direction=${direction:doublequote}}
AND panos.action:($action) AND $Logsql
| stats by (panos.destination_location) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 5

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=panos,panos.device_name in(${firewall:doublequote}),panos.virtual_system in(${virtual_system:doublequote}),panos.type=${type:doublequote},panos.threat/content_type in(${subtype:doublequote}),network.direction=${direction:doublequote}}
AND panos.action:($action) AND $Logsql
| stats by (source.ip,panos.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=panos,panos.device_name in(${firewall:doublequote}),panos.virtual_system in(${virtual_system:doublequote}),panos.type=${type:doublequote},panos.threat/content_type in(${subtype:doublequote}),network.direction=${direction:doublequote}}
AND panos.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND source.nat.ip:*
| stats by (source.nat.ip,panos.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

AND panos.action:($action) AND $Logsql
| stats by (panos.application_category,panos.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=panos,panos.device_name in(${firewall:doublequote}),panos.virtual_system in(${virtual_system:doublequote}),panos.type=${type:doublequote},panos.threat/content_type in(${subtype:doublequote}),network.direction=${direction:doublequote}}
AND panos.action:($action) AND $Logsql
| stats by (panos.application_subcategory,panos.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

options.content:
- **data** Data pattern matching a Data Filtering profile.
- **file** File type matching a File Blocking profile.
- **flood** Flood detected via a Zone Protection profile.
- **packet** Packet-based attack protection triggered by a Zone Protection profile.
- **scan** Scan detected via a Zone Protection profile.
- **spyware** Spyware detected via an Anti-Spyware profile.
- **url** URL filtering log.
- **ml-virus** Virus detected by WildFire Inline ML via an Antivirus profile.
- **virus** Virus detected via an Antivirus profile.
- **vulnerability** Vulnerability exploit detected via a Vulnerability Protection profile.
- **wildfire** A WildFire verdict generated when the firewall submits a file to WildFire per a WildFire Analysis profile and a verdict (malware, phishing, grayware, or benign, depending on what you are logging) is logged in the WildFire Submissions log.
- **wildfire-virus** Virus detected via an Antivirus profile.

options.content:
- **data** Data pattern matching a Data Filtering profile.
- **file** File type matching a File Blocking profile.
- **flood** Flood detected via a Zone Protection profile.
- **packet** Packet-based attack protection triggered by a Zone Protection profile.
- **scan** Scan detected via a Zone Protection profile.
- **spyware** Spyware detected via an Anti-Spyware profile.
- **url** URL filtering log.
- **ml-virus** Virus detected by WildFire Inline ML via an Antivirus profile.
- **virus** Virus detected via an Antivirus profile.
- **vulnerability** Vulnerability exploit detected via a Vulnerability Protection profile.
- **wildfire** A WildFire verdict generated when the firewall submits a file to WildFire per a WildFire Analysis profile and a verdict (malware, phishing, grayware, or benign, depending on what you are logging) is logged in the WildFire Submissions log.
- **wildfire-virus** Virus detected via an Antivirus profile.

spec.description:
Custom LogsQL filter attached to every query.
Set to "*" to not filter.
See https://docs.victoriametrics.com/victorialogs/logsql/
spec.name: Logsql
